name: Surprise Slinger
description:
Warning: There are definitely bugs, I ran out of testing time :D (If you drag a card and it stays on the screen out of the "hand" box, try moving it again to get it to work)

An endless card slinger like game about opening packs and slingin cards to save christmas from a variety of "monsters".

Instructions are in game but: 

  • Drag card out of hand area to use.
  • Move cards are for obstacles like walls, but can also use attack on them.
  • Attack cards are for enemies.
  • Mulligan replaces current hand.
  • Press end turn once you have played everything you would like. TURNS DO NOT END ON THEIR OWN.

Also, there are sounds but I ran out of time so there are basically 2 sounds :)

I hope you enjoy!

[Made in Unity. All assets are made by me.]

NOTE: v3 was submitted before the final deadline, v4 and v5 fix a bug each but were added just after the deadline so technically don't count. I just thought I'd add them anyway.
(v4 fixes a bug that prevented one of the surprise card functions happening, v5 fixed a bug in v4 that hid the deck and graveyard count)
